    • isNatural

      public static boolean isNatural(int number)
      Checks if the number is natural, i.e. is an integer higher than or equal 0.
      Parameters:
      number - checked number
      Returns:
      true if the given number is natural, false otherwise

    • isPrime

      public static boolean isPrime(int number)
      Checks whether a number is prime or not
      Parameters:
      number - checked number
      Returns:
      true if the number is prime, false otherwise
      Implementation Note:
      this method uses Eratosthenes' sieve to determine if the number is prime

      Parameters:

      needle - a searched number
      Returns:
